response_text: Here are some of the best free AI video translator tools you can use right now:  Top Free Options  Vozo AI Video Translator – Free online tool with AI‑dubbed audio, voice cloning, subtitles, and lip sync in ~110+ languages without signup. Vozo [https://www.vozo.ai/video-translate]  CapCut AI Video Translator – Free subtitle translation for videos (~27+ languages) with auto‑generated synced captions. CapCut [https://www.capcut.com/tools/video-translator]  Happy Scribe – Lets you translate up to ~10 minutes for free (subtitles/transcriptions in 120+ languages). happyscribe.com [https://www.happyscribe.com/translate-video]  Invideo AI Video Translator – Free tier can translate audio and captions into 50+ languages. Invideo [https://invideo.io/make/video-translator/]  BlipCut AI Video Translator – Free browser‑based translation with voice cloning and lip sync. Video Translator [https://videotranslator.blipcut.com/]  Also Worth Trying  Maestra AI – Free trial with auto subtitles, translations into 125+ languages (voice/cloning options). Maestra AI [https://maestra.ai/tools/video-translator]  Wayin.ai Video Translator – Free online subtitle translation into 100+ languages. WayinVideo [https://wayin.ai/tools/video-translator/]  ScreenPal AI Video Translator – Free trial with subtitles and voiceovers in 140+ languages. ScreenPal [https://screenpal.com/tool/ai-video-translator]  Notes  Many tools offer true translation + dubbing (voice + lip sync), while others focus on subtitle translation only. Synthesia [https://www.synthesia.io/post/best-video-translator-apps]  Free plans often have time limits, watermarks, or export limits. Bureau Works [https://www.bureauworks.com/blog/best-ai-video-and-voice-generation-tools-in-2025]  If you want simple accurate subtitles, CapCut or Vozo are strong free picks. For dubbed audio with voice and lip sync, Vozo or BlipCut are better.
